data.title: Our Lady of Light
data.text:
Our Lady of Light – Hermanus Catholic Church

Parish Priest: Fr Gerard Walmsley: Bredasdorp ; Gansbaai & Zwelihle form part of the Parish.

Parish Contacts:

Parish Priest: Fr Gerard Walmsley

Tel: 066 102 3479

Email: catholicchurch@hermanus.co.za

Parish Secretary: Caryn Bonorchis

Tel: 066 102 3479

Email: catholicchurch@hermanus.co.za

Office Times: Caryn is available: Monday, Wednesday, Friday 9:00am – 1pm

OLOL Address: 21 Lord Roberts Road, Hermanus

Please take note of the regular MASS times for Hermanus:

Saturday – 5:00pm

Sunday – 8:00am

Wednesday – 9:00am

Friday – 9:00am – followed by Chaplet of Divine Mercy

Alternatively please click on the link below for regular MASS times at the other parishes:

https://www.facebook.com/Our-Lady-of-Light-Catholic-Church-Hermanus-101069304828352/

Key: OLOL – Our Lady of Light

: StPF – Saint Peter the Fisherman

: MOA – Martyrs of Africa

: OLF – Our Lady of Fatima

The main Mass in the Parish Church (Sunday 8am at OLOL) MUST be offered for the intention of the Parish.T

Click on the link below for the 1st edition of the Archdiocesan News for 2024.

https://adct.org.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/ad-news-1-of-2024.pdf

Be mindful of others in Church : Before Mass, Speak to God ; During Mass, Let God speak to you ; After Mass, Speak to Each Other.

SVP – 100 Club Bank details: 100 Club, FNB Bank, Branch Code 200412, Account Nr 626 759 961 63.

Remembrance Plaques: Should you wish to have a plaque made to be placed on our Remembrance Wall in memory of a loved one. Please contact Caryn at the Office to place your order

CATECHISM / YOUTH / CONFIRMATION: Please note details will be posted to the Facebook page.

Top

Monthly Finances – pdf

Notices for the specific Communities: Please see the Facebook page for specific notices

Our Lady of Light – Hermanus

Remember the Church is open Mon, Wed and Fri: 9.00am – 1.00pm for quiet reflection and prayers

Confessions: by appointment, please contact Fr Walmsley or the Office.

Baptisms ; Marriages ; Funerals : please contact Fr Walmsley or the Office.

Please note that for Marriages at least 6 months notice is needed.
